Entries.give_flowersA: A bouquet, huh? Pretty!$h#$b#Oh, for me? ... I accept!$4#$b#...I guess this means I'm your boyfriend...$h
Entries.give_flowersB: Are you being serious right now?$h#$b#Absolutely. I never would have thought...$4#$b#I'm so happy to be your boyfriend.$h
Entries.give_pendant: ...! I...are you serious? Yes!$4#$b#This is too good to be true... Do I have food poisoning?$4#$b#I'm so happy. I'll talk to the mayor. Everything should be ready in three days.$h
Entries.stardrop_gift: @, my sweet honey, you have always been so good to me.$4#$b#I thought that this stardrop would be a delicious way to show my love.$h#$b#Go on! Eat it! It's full of nutrients to give you energy!$h
Entries.rejectNPCA: HAHA... You're not sweet-talking me into giving you free food.$h
Entries.reject_two_heartA: You sure you haven't had one too many, @?$h
Entries.reject_two_heartB: Hmm. Nah, I'm too into my job, I'm afraid.$h
Entries.reject_four_heartA: Haha... I'm gonna go ahead and say no more drinks for tonight.$h
Entries.reject_four_heartB: Oh... I mean.. well...$4#$b#I think we should just be friends.$h
Entries.engageA: I'm pretty sure it's not a good idea to pass this around after you get engaged.
Entries.engageB: I wonder why you have a second pendant... that's a rare occurrence.
Entries.marriedA: I am sure %spouse would be hurt to see what you're doing.$3
Entries.marriedB: What are you thinking?  Go home and be a good spouse to %spouse.
Entries.refusal_knownA: Haha, that's a pretty pendant, isn't it?$h
Entries.refusal_knownB: You can give that to someone you love, you know?$h
Entries.refusal_botherA: Hey, can you please stop? This is uncomfortable.$2
Entries.refusal_botherB: Stop it. I've made myself clear.$3
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: I'm not looking to get married anytime soon.$h
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: I think I'm fine as I am... thank you.$h
